text: "Wait" is a song by English rock band the Beatles. It was written by Paul McCartney, but listed as Lennon-McCartney."1970: John talking about his songs [telephone interview]", The Ray Connolly Beatles Archive, Plumray Books, 2011, Kindle edition, ASIN: B0052AFE6S It was first released on the band's 1965 album Rubber Soul. ==Personnel== From Ian MacDonald: *John Lennon - double tracked vocal, rhythm guitar *Paul McCartney - double tracked vocal, bass guitar *George Harrison - lead guitar *Ringo Starr - drums, maracas, tambourine ==References== ==Sources== * * Category:The Beatles songs Category:1965 songs
title: Wait (Beatles song)
